body: Doesn't have to be this PR, but it would be nice if `CUDAStreamInternals` stored `cudaStream_t` as a `std::unique_ptr<CUStream_st, CUDAStreamDeleter>` where CUDAStreamDeleter is a functor that calls `cudaStreamDestroy`. Example of this in the cudnn descriptor code.
